sentences.en: Aerosol particles affect visibility, climate, and our health and quality of life.
sentences.cn: 气溶胶对大气能见度 、 气候变化以及人类健康等有重要影响.

sentences.en: An aerosol spray will make short work of painting awkward objects.
sentences.cn: 用喷罐来喷涂，不好对付的物品也能轻松搞定。

sentences.en: Chewing gum - ice or use aerosol freezer to harden and scrape off.
sentences.cn: 口香糖冰或者气雾剂冷柜冻硬并且剐掉.

sentences.en: Do not spray aerosol or pump products in enclosed areas.
sentences.cn: 不喷气雾剂或泵产品,在密封领域.

sentences.en: Elaborate equipment for generating and distributing the aerosol is necessary.
sentences.cn: 为产生和弥散气雾,必须有专门设备.

sentences.en: In the early 1960 s a worldwide aerosol band was discovered in the lower stratosphere at 17 - 24 km.
sentences.cn: 在六十年代初期,在17-24公里平流层下部发现世界范围气溶胶带.

sentences.en: It's useful as chemical material. aerosol and domestic fuel.
sentences.cn: 它可用作化工原料,气雾剂汝民用燃料.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To study the hypoglycemic effects of insulin aerosol ( INS AOL ) by pulmonary delivery.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究胰岛素气雾剂经肺部给药后的降血糖作用.

sentences.en: On her own to peanuts and spraying aerosol ( control grubs ).
sentences.cn: 背起喷雾器往花生地喷药 ( 防治蛴螬 ).

sentences.en: The chlorofluoromethanes are used principally in aerosol spray cans and as refrigerants .
sentences.cn: 氯氟甲烷主要使用在气溶胶喷雾罐和作为冷冻剂。

sentences.en: The chlorofluoromethanes are used principally in aerosol spray cans and as refrigerants.
sentences.cn: 氯氟甲烷主要使用在气溶胶喷雾罐和作为冷冻剂.

sentences.en: The influence of the atmospheric aerosol on local and regional atmospheric conditions is readily appreciated.
sentences.cn: 气溶胶对局部和区域大气状况的影响是很容易鉴别的.

sentences.en: The mission will also observe clouds and aerosol particles in the troposphere.
sentences.cn: 此次任务还将观测对流层中的云和气溶胶粒子。

sentences.en: The spectrum of aerosol optical thickness accords with Angstrom relation.
sentences.cn: 气溶胶光学厚度谱基本满足Angstrom关系.

sentences.en: They also found that new aerosol particles — ultrafine particles suspended in the atmosphere — can form at these heights.
sentences.cn: 他们还发现新的气溶胶颗粒——悬浮在大气中的超细颗粒——可以在这个高度形成。

sentences.en: They sprayed aerosol insect repellent into the faces of police.
sentences.cn: 他们将喷雾驱虫剂喷在了警察的脸上.

sentences.en: This is not at all characteristic of what is known concerning the dry aerosol.
sentences.cn: 这根本不是我们已知的有关于气溶胶的特征.

sentences.en: When writing about aerosol one is continually invited to digress.
sentences.cn: 在描述气溶胶时人们经常离题.

words.tran_cn: [物化]气溶胶；[化工][中医][药]气雾剂；喷雾器；浮质

phrases.tran_cn: 气溶胶喷射剂；气溶胶火箭燃料

trans.tran_cn: [化]气溶胶，喷雾剂，悬浮微粒，喷雾器
trans.tran_en: a small metal container with liquid inside. You press a button on the container to make the liquid come out in very small drops.
